corpususer.utterance: I am looking for some information.  I need to find a cheap place to stay.
We have ten places in the area with cheap pricing options, any other things to search for to narrow it down?
a star rating of 0
At 0 stars your choices are El Shaddai, or City Centre North B&B.
Well can you recommend the a hotel from these choices and then book me 2 nights for 4 people starting from Friday. I will need my booking reference number.
You are good to go, the reference number is F4WHX6KU, can I help with anything else?
Now I need to find a place to go visit, should be in the east part of the town
There are many places to visit on the east side.  Would you like a museum, a park, boating, or something else?
If you have any recommendations that would be great! I will need the entrance fee of whichever you choose.
Camboats is very fun, a boat attraction. Would you like more info on it?
What is their entrance fee?
Unfortunately, I do not have access to their entrance fee.  However, you can reach them at 01223902112 to inquire.  Is there anything else I can do for you today?
I need a taxi between the hotel and the Camboats. I want to leave the Camboats by 3:45.
Ok. I booked a black toyota for you.  Your contact number is 07070847179.
Okay that will be all then. Thank you for your help.
Enjoy your taxi and day.
Thank you very much, I appreciate all the services you offer.
You're welcome, have a great day!

corpususer.utterance: I need to what trains are leaving Friday evening.
Where are you looking to depart from?
I'm leaving from Peterborough.
There are two trains an hour leaving peterborough all evening. Do you know what time you plan to leave?

TR4182 leaves Peterborough at 18:19 and arrives in Cambridge at 19:09. Will this work for you?
Yes, that's perfect. What is the price?
The price is 16.50 pounds.
Thank you very much. That is all for today.
Are you certain you don't need further assistance?
Yes I am sure. Thank you.
You're welcome.  Thank you for using the Cambridge TownInfo centre.  Goodbye.

corpususer.utterance: I need a taxi to meet me at my restaurant.
What location and time would you like to get the taxi for?
im in Cambridge central and would like to be picked at 1200hrs
I need more information about your location.  What is your exact departure site and what is your destination?
Actually never mind.  I would just like to find a college to visit in town.
We have many colleges, is there are particular part of town you are interested in?
No, no particular part of town. I will take a recommendation from you. I will need the postcode, area, and entrance fee please.
Okay Christ's College is free and is in the centre. The address is Saint Andrew's Street and post code is cb23bu.
Okay, thank you. I'm also looking for a place to stay. It needs to be in the centre, moderately priced, and include wifi.
cityroomz would suit your needs. Would you like me to book it for you?
Yes I'd like it for 4 people and 4 nights starting Saturday.
Okay, you've got it. I booked successfully for you, and the ref. number is 103OAAXG
That's great, thanks, have a good day.
Can I look up anything else for you?
yes I would need a taxi
Do you want the taxi taking you from the hotel or to the hotel? What time do you wish to arrive or depart?
I need to leave the hotel by 10:00.
Where are you looking to travel?
Going from attraction to hotel.
Booking completed! Booked car type white bmw. Contact number is 07232889421. is there something else i could help you with?
That's all for now. Thank you for all your help and have a great day.
You're welcome, let me know if I can assist with anything else.

corpususer.utterance: I'm looking for Crossover food in the centre.
I'm sorry but there are no restaurants in that area that serve Crossover food. Can I help you find one in a different area?
A moderate priced crossover located in the centre, nothing?
No, I am so sorry but there are no restaurants that match that description.
How about modern european food?
De luca cucina and bar is available would you like to try that?
Sounds wonderful! May I have their postcode, address and phone number please?
Yes, their postcode is cb21aw, address is 83 Regent Street, and phone number is 01223356666. Can I help you with anything else?
Yes, actually, I need to find a train schedule. I'll be traveling from Cambridge to London Liverpool Street.
There are many trains making that trip, do you have a day and time you would like to travel?
Yes, I'm traveling on Saturday, and I will need to arrive by 14:30.
I do have train TR3312 that departs at 11:59 and arrives by 13:27. Would that be something that would work for you?
Yes, that would work quote well. I won't be needing a ticket just yet, though. Thank you!
Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's all I need. Thank you for all your help - goodbye!
Okay great. Glad I could help.

Yes. Rosa's bed and breakfast has a cheap price range. Aylesbray lodge guest house has a moderate price range. Would you like me to book one for you?
I meant to say west, not south. And the place needs to be a hotel type.
The huntingdon marriott hotel	is in the west area, it has free wifi, and it is in the expensive price range. Shall I book reservations?
No at this time. What is the postcode for the hotel and do they have free parking?
They do have free parking, the postcode is pe296fl
Thank you. I also need to find a train for Tuesday.
Ok... I need more information for your train, such as departure or arrival times, number of people, day, and destination.
I would like to go to Peterborough on Tuesday and I will need to leave after 20:00.  Can you tell me when I will arrive and the price?
Okay, there is a train leaving cambridge for peterborough tuesday at 20:34 arriving at 21:24 for 16.50 pounds.  Would you like me to book this for you?
Yes I would, thank you.
I'd be happy to. How many tickets will you need?
I don't care.
You are booked on train TR5110. Your reference # is AD3EUZB8.  The cost is 16.5 and payable at the station.  Can I help you with anything else?
Nope, that's all I needed. Thank you!
Thank you. Have a good day.

You are looking for information in Cambridge.
You are looking for a restaurant. The restaurant should serve south indian food and should be in the centre.
If there is no such restaurant, how about one that serves italian food.
Once you find the restaurant you want to book a table for 4 people at 18:30 on saturday.
Make sure you get the reference number.
You are also looking for places to go in town. The attraction should be in the type of mutliple sports and should be in the same area as the restaurant.
If there is no such attraction, how about one that is in the type of college.
Make sure you get postcode, entrance fee, and phone number.
You also want to book a taxi to commute between the two places.
You want to make sure it arrives the restaurant by the booked time.
Make sure you get contact number and car type

corpususer.utterance: Please find a place to eat that serves South Indian food in the center.
I'm afraid there are not any. Would you like to try a different part of town or cuisine?
How about Italian food in the centre part of town?  I think that that would work out for me.
There are plenty of locations for Italian! Do you have a specific price range in mind?
No any place will do.
don pasquale pizzeria is an excellent but expensive place in the city centre. would you like more information on it?
That sounds perfect. Could you book a table for 4 people at 18:30 on saturday.
It is booked and the reference number is 6KV9DIDF
I am looking for places to go in town.
Sure! Is there any particular part of the city you want to see, or anything specific you'd like to visit?
I need more info on churches
There are four churches in the centre known for their architecture.  Are you interested in seeing all saint's church?
I'm actually not looking for a church, I need to find a multiple sports attraction near the restaurant.
I'm sorry, but there are no multiple sports attractions in the centre. Would you like me to look for a different kind of attraction near the restaurant?
Sure let's try a college.
There are quite a few.  Were you looking for anything specific pricewise?
Can you give me the name of a popular one?  I'd also like the postcode, entrance fee and phone number.
How about corpus christi college? Its address is saint andrew's street, postcode is cb21rh, and their phone number is 01223338000.
What about the entrance fee? Is there one?
we have four with free entrance
which one do you recommend?
I would recommend Downing College and it is free to enter. Would you like their address?
just postcode and phone please
post code is cb21dq, phone is 01223334860, in case you need the adderss it is on regent street.  Any further questions?
I'll also need to get a taxi to go between the 2 places.
I can help you with that. Which location would you like to have as your pickup point?
I'll need picked up at the College to go to the restaurant.
I have you set for a taxi to get there right in time for your booking, look for a white lexus, they are reachable at 07566657952, any further questions?
Is there a reference number I need?
No, there isn't a reference number just the car type and contact number. Will there be anything else I can assist you with today?
That is all I need today, thanks.
You're welcome. It was a pleasure helping you today. Good-bye.

corpususer.utterance: I need a train going to bishops stortford.
Ok. and where are you departing from?
I'll be departing from Cambridge.
And what day will you be traveling on?
I would like to travel on Sunday.
Is there a certain time you would like to leave after or arrive by?
I can't leave until after 20:30.
TR1389 leaves at 21:29
Can you arrange travel for 7 people for TR1389 on Sunday?
Of course. The reference number is NI1LNIIP. The total fee is 56.56 which can be paid at the station.
Great, thank you. I am also looking for a modern European restaurant.
I have 5 options for you. Do you have a price range in mind?
Yes. It should be in the moderate price range.
The three choices are Restaurant Alimentum, De Luca Cucina, and Riverside Brasserie. Do you require me to book the table?
The Riverside Brasserie sounds good. Can you tell me the area they are located in?
Riverside Brasserie is located in the centre. Can I help you with anything else today?
I don't know that area very well, can you give me the exact address? I'll use gps to get there. Thanks!
Doubletree by Hilton Cambridge Granta Place Mill Lane is the address

corpususer.utterance: What area is that in?

Well, can I get some african food instead?

Is it in he expensive range? If it is I would like to book a table for 7 at 1:00 on Sunday.

Yes, I want to book a table for 19:00.

Yes, can you see if there is a booking available at 18:00 instead? I will also need to make a hotel reservation in a hotel that offers free wifi.

Nope that should be it thanks
Great, I hope I was able to assist you with everything you needed. Have a good day.

You are very welcome. Enjoy your stay!

corpususer.utterance: I'm planning a trip to go to a particular restaurant, can you assist?
Sure, what is the name of this particular restaurant?
It's called Nandos and I'd like to book it for Monday at 15:00.  There will be 6 people.
No problem! I have your table reserved for 15:00 on Monday. They will hold your table for 15 minutes, your reference number is HVB51VAM.
thank you. Am also looking for places to go in town. The attraction should be in the east
What are you looking to do? My system has located 10 places.
Could you recommend something?
Yes, the funky fun house is a great place.
Great! Can you tell me what the entrance fee is please?

Thank you. I'm also looking to book a taxi to travel between the two. I need it to arrive to the restaurant by the reservation time.

That's all. Thank you for your help!
I hope you enjoy your stay!

corpususer.utterance: I'm looking to play a variety of sports. Are there facilities that cater to that?
Yes, there is one such facility, The Cherry Hinton Village Centre, located at colville road, cherry hinton in the east side of town.
Do you have anything like that in the centre?
Unfortunately, we do not.
What about a museum in the center?
I have listings for 5, can i recommend one?
Yes please, and I'm going to need the address.
You may want to try castle galleries.
What is their address?
The Castle Galleries is located at Unit SU43, Grande Arcade, Saint Andrews Street.  It's in the City Centre.
Okay, that sounds great. I also need a train that leaves on Sunday after 17:30 from Cambridge going to Stevenage.
I have train TR8726 that would leave at 19:21 and get you to Stevenage at 20:10. Would that work for you?
Yeah, can you book 4 tickets for me?

Booking was successful, the total fee is 40.96 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : MVFN99UC.
Thanks a bunch! I couldn't have done it without you. Bye.
You are welcome. Thank you for contacting the Cambridge TownInfo centre. Goodbye.

corpususer.utterance: Hello! I need a place to bed down for the night that offers free parking and wifi. Can you help me?
Yes, I can help. Do you have a price range and part of town in mind?
I would like a moderate priced hotel in any part of town please.

Yes, please book the Ashley Hotel.
Certainly. What day would you like to stay?
On second thought, I'm not ready to book yet. Could you give me the address and phone number of the Ashley Hotel?

Thank you for your help. If I need anything else, I will certainly call again.
We are here to help, cheers.

corpususer.utterance: I'm looking for a cheap place to stay with free wifi.
We have 10 possibilities for you. Do you have any additional preferences?
Yes, I am looking for a hotel with a 2 star rating.

Let's try something in the moderate price range with two stars and free wifi please.
I have two options in the moderate price range. The Ashley House and Lovell Lodge. Would you like to try one of these?
Lets try the Ashley House please.
When will your stay be?
We'll arrive on Wednesday and stay 3 nights. There will be 2 of us.

That is all I need for now. Thank you for finding the hotel.

corpususer.utterance: I would like to make a reservation at the Maharajah Tandoori restaurant for my trip to Cambridge.
For when and how many?
Can you book a table for 5 people at 16:00 on monday?

Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : ZB0MA4IZ. May I help you further?
Yes, I also need a train for the same day. We are coming from Stevenage.
Train TR9013 will get you from Stevenage to Cambridge at 14:43. It departs at 13.54. Would you like to book a ticket?
I'd prefer something earlier, actually. I need to be in Cambridge by 12:30.
I have a train arriving at 10:43. How does that sound?
That sounds great.  What time does it leave and how much will it cost me?
It leaves at 9:54 and it will cost 12.80.
Please book it and send me the reference number.
Your train tickets are booked for TR 8265, departing from Stevenage at 9:54, arriving in Cambridge at 10:43. Your reference number isD0V6U0MA. Total is 64 GBP payable at the station.
Fantastic, thank you for the information.
Is there anything else that I can do for you?
I think that is all I needed today. Thank you.
You're welcome. Have a great day.

corpususer.utterance: I am looking for places to go in town. Maybe a museum. I would prefer it to be in the centre of cambridge.
There are 11 museums located in the centre of Cambridge. Did you have one in particular in mind or a type you would be interested in visiting?
Whatever you recommend. I do need an address, though.
I recommend the castle galleries, it is located at unit su43, grande arcade, saint andrews street. Would you also like the phone number?
Yes please!!  I would also like to book a train arriving in Cambridge before 13:00.
Castle Galleries can be reached at 01223307402. Where are you departing from and which day are you traveling?
I am traveling on Saturday and I am departing from stansted airport
I have found 8 trains meeting your criteria. The first leaves at 0524. Would you like me to book it for you?
Yes, please! Can I also get the train ID and the price on that?
TR4194 will cost 8.08 pounds. How many tickets do you need?
I need one ticket.
Okay, Booking was successful, the total fee is 8.08 GBP payable at the station. Your reference number is : KLU8N9Y4. Is there anything else I can help with?
No, that's it! Thank you for your help
It's not a problem! Thanks for using the Cambridge TownInfo centre!

corpususer.utterance: I'd like a train from Birmingham New Street that will arrive by 12:45, please.
What is your destination and what day would you like to leave?
I am coming to cambidge on friday.
Great.  There are four trains available with departure times every hour starting at 05:40 until 09:40.  Would you like to book a ticket on one of them?
Yes please, I need 6 tickets and a reference number for my purchase when you are done.  Thanks!

You are successfully booked for 4 ticket with a total fee of 450.6 GBP that is payable at the station and the reference number is : 5JAC9295. May i help you with something else? If not have an awesome day.
I am also looking for a hotel. I think it is called Kirkwood House.
Yes I've found the kirkwood house at 172 chesterton road. Would you like me to make a reservation?
Yes please. Can you please make the it for six people and for three nights starting on the same day as the train.
I'm sorry, there is no availability for that time frame. Would you like to travel a different amount of days?
Can you check for 2 nights instead? And I need the reference number.

Booking was successful.
Reference number is : DOSXP70O. Is there anything else you need to know?
No, thank you. Have a great day!
You too, enjoy your stay in Cambridge.

What area would you like the hotel in?
I would like it to be in South please.

I am looking for an expensive place to stay.

I would like a hotel please.

How many people?
How many people will be staying with you?
I need it booked for 3 people for 5 nights starting from friday.
Booked! Reference number: 68SV7AUH.
Thank you, I also need to find a place to eat serving mexican food in the same area as the hotel

Can I have the phone number and post code for that please?
Their phone number is 01223400170 and their postcode is cb17dy
I need a taxi from the hotel to the restaurant, leaving the hotel by 02:30, I have to make sure Im first in line when they open for breakfast.
Out taxis operate 24/7, so you are in luck.  Look for a white skoda, there phone number is 07842340394, any further questions?
No thats all I need for today.
Okay. You have a great day.

On second thought could you book Alexander B&B for Saturday night please.

I'm not sure but I do need to book a train from Kings Lynn to Cambridge after 16:30 on a Monday.
The first available train from Kings Lynn to Cambridge that leaves after 16:30 on Monday is the TR0415; would you like to go ahead and book this?

thank you.

Have a great day!

corpususer.utterance: I'd like to find a college to visit.
There are 18 colleges to choose from. Are you looking to visit a specific area?
Yes somewhere in Cambridge.
There are 13 in the centre of the town, many of them offer free entrance. Would you be interested in Christ's college?
Yes, could I get their phone number please? I also need a guesthouse in the West as well.
You can reach Christ's College at 01223334900. As far as guesthouses, I have 2 that meet your criteria. Both offer free wifi and parking. Hobson's House is moderately priced.
Hobson's House sounds interesting. What is their phone number?
You can reach Hobsons House at 01223304906. Is there anything else I can help you with?
That sounds good, thank you.
Would you like me to book a room for you at Hobson's House?
No, thank you. I just only need the information of the guesthouse.
Hobsons House is in the west, on 96 barton road, cb39lh. It's in the moderate price range. It's a 3 star hotel with free wifi and parking. Anything else?
That will be all. Thank you!
Please contact us again if there is anything else you should need.
That seems to be all I need. Thank You.
You are very welcome. Good bye.

corpususer.utterance: What trains are available from Cambridge on Monday
The first train departs at 05:00 and every 2 hours. The last one leaves at 13:00. Can I book you some tickets?
I wanted to leave after 13:00. When is the last train to kings lynn?
There is one leaving at 13:11, and they run every hour after that. That last one on Monday leaves at 23:11 and arrives at 23:58.
Great. How much is the ticket for the train leaving at 13:11? What time does it arrive and what is the travel time?
Sure, TR0793 leaves at 13:11, arrives at 13:58 and costs 9.80 pounds travel time 47 minutes.
Sounds good. Get me a ticket for TR0793. Thank you in advance.
The booking was successful, you will pay 9.8 GBP at the station.  Your reference number is HIF2WMPY.  Is there anything else I can help you with?
I also would like to find an entertainment area in town. Any suggestions?

Yeah that'd be good can you please give me the address and postcode as well?
Funky Fun House is located at 8 mercers row, mercers row industrial estate, cb58hy. Can I help you with anything else today?
Great that's all the info I need!
Bon voyage!

corpususer.utterance: I'd like to find a 4 star hotel with free wifi, please.
Sure, what part of town would you like to stay in?
I want something in the east part of town.
Did you have a price range in mind?
I am flexible about cost, I would prefer free wifi and a 4 star rating though.
Unfortunately there aren't any hotels that match that description, would be willing to change your specifications?
I'm looking for a hotel that has wifi and a rating of 4 stars in the east part of the city.
There are no hotels that meet that critera, would you be interested in a guesthouse perhaps? We have several of those that fit that critera.
Sure, what do you have available for a guesthouse with that criteria?
There are 6 guesthouses in the east that have 4 stars and free wifi.  3 are moderate in price and 3 are cheap.  All but 1 have free parking.
Please book one for me in the moderate price range.
Sure, I just need some more information.  When will you be arriving and for how long?
I will be arriving on Friday for 4 nights.  There will be 6 of us.
I booked it for a and b guest house. Your reference number is 8K0I474M. Is there anything else I could help you with today?
Yes, I need a train on Tuesday to Leicester.
Where do you want to leave from? Also do you have a preference for an arrival or departure time?
It should depart from Cambridge and arrive by 21:00.
There is a train that arrives at leichester by 20:06.  It is TR0776, shall I book this for you?
Yes, please I need tickets for all 6 of us and I need a reference number
Booking was successful, the reference number is 7BB9B19A., the total cost will be 37.80 payable at the station, can I help with anything else.
I got the reference number of 7BB9B19A thank you!
Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, that was all.  Thank you.
Thank you for using our service. Have a good day. Goodbye.

corpususer.utterance: We want to try a restaurant in the centre of Cambridge.
What type of food do you prefer?
I am really in the mood for some Hungarian food, something expensive since it is a special occasion.
I'm not finding Hungarian restaurants in the centre of Cambridge. Would you like to try another area or another type of cuisine?
how about one that serves french food
No French restaurants either. Perhaps in a different area?
Let's keep looking in the centre area for now. Perhaps you can list some other available cuisines.
Actually, there is a French restaurant in the centre part of town. The Cote restaurant serves French food and is the expensive price range. Would you like to book a table?
No but I would like the phone number.
Sure, their phone number is 01223311053. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Thanks, and yes, I am also looking for a train leaving Stansted airport and arriving in Cambridge by 9:15.
On what day and time could you like to travel?
I need to leave on Monday.
The TR7360 train arrives at Cambridge at 8:52 on Monday. Would you like to purchase tickets on this train?
Can you book that for two people and then give me the reference number?
All set. Your reference is TVLEP11V and 20.2 GBP is payable at the station. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
That will be all. Thanks so much for your help.
you are welcome any time you need our help
Okay sounds great. Bye!
Have a great day! Good-bye.

corpususer.utterance: Hi, I am coming to Cambridge soon and am excited to eat at some great restaurants.  Can you recommend an attraction for me to visit while I'm there?
What type of attraction were you interested in?
I don't have a preference, but I'd like it to be in the centre.
Well, we've got the all saints church in the centre and it's free to visit.
A free church would cover a lot of my local historical interests. What is their phone number?
The phone number is 01223452587. The address is jesus lane with the post code of cb58bs. Do you need any other information?
I'm also looking for an expensive place to dine that's in the same area as the church.
We have a number of wonderful options for you to dine at in Centre, do you have a particular cuisine in mind or would you like a reccomendation?
I would like some Indian type food.
I have 6 Indian restaurants for you to choose from. May I recommend The Golden Curry?
That would be great. Can you book it for 6 people at 14:15 on Wednesday?
I'm sorry but I wasn't able to make those reservation. Can I try another time?

data.message:
You are looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the expensive price range and doesn't need to have free parking.
The hotel should include free wifi.
If there is no such hotel, how about one that has free parking.
Once you find the hotel you want to book it for 5 people and 3 nights starting from sunday.
Make sure you get the reference number

corpususer.utterance: I am looking for a hotel ti stay in the expensive range. It does not have to be free parking.
I have about 5 different expensive hotels. Do you prefer a certain area of town?
No. But it should have free wifi.
All 5 of the expensive hotels in have free wifi. Are you looking for any star rating, to help narrow the search?
I don't care about the number of stars. If you don't have one without parking, I'll take one with parking. Choose the best one, please.
I hear the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel is nice.  Would you like to try booking there?
Yes. There will be 5 of us staying for 3 nights, arriving on Sunday. I sure hope Cambridge is nice this time of year.
Sorry, that's not available. Could you pick another day, time, or stay length?
Is there another hotel available that will accommodate my stay?
There is gonville hotel. Would you like to try that one?
Sure. Same parameters, please.
Nope, sorry, unsuccessful. Would you like to try the lensfield hotel?
Sure, see if that works
Sorry, the Lensfield booking was unavailable, as well. May I help find something else?
Are you sure there is nothing available? Will you double check?
Good news. I checked again at the Huntingdon Marriott, and they were able to accommodate your party. Your reference number is 1H7F4GBJ.
Okay, thank you, that is all I need today.
Glad to help.  Bye.

corpususer.utterance: Is the mumford theatre still in operation?

yes. that will help alot

Please I am also looking for an expensive restaurant to dine at.

Do you have a European option?
What area do you prefer?
I need this to be in the est please.

get me its post code
The postcode for the Cambridge Lodge Restaurant is cb30dq. Can I help with anything else today?
Can you book a taxi for me? I'd like to leave the restaurant by 03:00 and go to the theatre.

Thank you! That is all that I need.
You're welcome, have a great day!

data.message:
You are planning your trip in Cambridge.
You are looking for places to go in town. The attraction should be in the type of college.
Make sure you get address and phone number.
You are also looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the moderate price range and should have a star of 2.
The hotel should be in the type of hotel.
Once you find the hotel you want to book it for 5 people and 4 nights starting from saturday.
If the booking fails how about tuesday.
Make sure you get the reference number

corpususer.utterance: Are there any colleges in town?
Why yes. Two in the centre of town and three in the west.
Could you recommend one for me?
I'd recommend Christ's College because it has free entrance. So does Clare Hall, Emmanuel College, Hughes Hall, and Jesus College. Along with a few others.
Okay, great. Can I have the address and phone number for Christ's College?
Their address is saint andrew's street and their phone number is 01223334900. Can I help you with anything else today?
I would like some help finding a room in the city. I really want it to be a hotel as opposed to a guesthouse.
Sure I can help you with that. Do you have a price range and do you know what area you want to stay in?
yes, I am looking for a hotel in a moderate price range with 2 stars and I will need to book 5 people for 4 nights. Thank you.
I have 2 options for you. Both are hotels in the north. They are both 2 stars and offer free parking and wifi. They are the Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge.
Let's make a booking with Ashley Hotel. I'll need the rooms starting on Saturday and I'll need the reference number as well.
You are all set! Your reference number for your booking is EDL2AH3X. Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, that will be all. Thank you for your help!
Thank you for using our system today!

corpususer.utterance: I need to book a train to cambridge from a train leaving from stevenage.
Hello, there are many options available, do you know what day or time you would like to arrive?
I would like to arrive at 8:45 on thursday
There are two trains that leave Stevenage and arrive in Cambrige at 6:43, one leaves at 5:54 and the other 7:54, would you like to book one of those?
Can you please book me for the train that arrives latest. I need 8 tickets.
I have booked 8 tickets for you on the train leaving at 7:54 and arriving at 8:43. Your reference number is NFDWJXJO.
Thank you, I'm also looking for a north indian restaurant in the centre area.
Unfortunately there are no North Indian restaurants in the centre of Cambridge. Is there a different area or type of cuisine that would suit you as well?
How about asian oriental food?
There are several options available in center Cambridge. I would be happy to assist with your reservation. What price range restaurant are you interested in?
I don't have a specific price range. Just something in the centre will be fine.
There are 4 options - dojo noodle bar, yippee noodle bar, j restaurant, and kymmoy. Would you like me to book a table at one of those?
You don't need to book me for any. Could I get the address for the Dojo Noodle Bar, however?
The address is 40210 Millers Yard City Centre. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Nope that should be it thank you
Thank you for using our service. Have a wonderful day.

corpususer.utterance: I will be visiting Cambridge soon and definitely want to see some local attractions. Can you help me?
I can definitely help you find one. We have nearly 80 attractions around. Can you tell me what type of attraction you prefer or an area you would like to go?
I am looking for the best museum in the centre of town. Please let me know what it is and how much I should expect to pay to get in.
The Castle Galleries is very popular and it has no entrance fee. Would you like the address?
No, but I do want the entrance fee.
The Castle Galleries are free of charge.
Thank you. I'm also looking for a guesthouse to stay that has a star of 4 and includes free parking.
Acorn guest house is available if that works for you.
Book rooms for 3 people for 4 nights starting Sunday, please.
Booking was successful. Your reference number is 6RQXSUYD. Can I help you with anything else?
I also need a taxi to commute from the hotel to the museum. I need to leave the hotel by 05:15
Sure!  I have set that up.  Booked car type is a white toyota and the Contact number is 07365958401.
Thank you so much for your help. That was all I needed.
You are quite welcome. Enjoy your visit to the galleries.

you are welcome

corpususer.utterance: Hi! Can you help me find an awesome nightclub to go to tonight? I don't want it to be too far away, so could you find one in the city centre?
There are 5 great nightclubs in the centre.  Four have a 5 pound entrance fee and one has a 4 pound entrance fee.  Would you like more information?
What is the name and postcode of any one of those nightclubs?
ballare is postcode cb23na, club salsa is postcode cb12jb, kambar is postcode cb23qb, the fez club is cb23hx and soul tree nightclub is cb23qf
Perfect thank you!  I also need to find a train leaving from peterborough, can you help me with that too?
Sure! What day would you like to leave Peterborough and what time would you like to arrive there?
I won't be able to get out of Peterborough before 19:00 on Friday.
The first train from Peterborough to Cambridge after 19:00 is the TR5474. Departs Peterborough 19:19, arrives Cambridge 20:09. Would you like me to book a seat for you?
Yes, that would be wonderful. Thanks.
Great. Can I confirm that you would like to book 1 seat?
Two seats, please.
You have two seats with reference number L2KLG459.  Total fee is 33 GB, payable at the station.  Can I be of further help today?
That's all. Thanks.
You're very welcome, have a great day!

corpususer.utterance: Hello. I'm trying to find a restaurant in the centre that serves Indian food.
Great! I've found 9 entries for your criteria. Is there a certain price range you're looking for?
I'm looking for something sort of on the cheap side.
We've narrowed it down to 3.  kihinoor, the gandhi, and mahal of cambridge.  Would you like me to make a reservation for you?
Yes please make a reservation for 3 people at 16:00 on Saturday at any of those choices.
I was able to book at Kohinoor for 16:00 on Saturday for 3 people.  Your reference number is NTJ52ASI.  The table will be held for 15 minutes.
I am also looking for a guesthouse that includes free wifi.
Yes I have several. What area and price range do you prefer?
The guesthouse should be in the same price range as the restaurant with a 4 start rating
The Alexander Bed and Breakfast matches those qualifications, as well as being located in the centre. Would you like a reservation or more information?
I would like to book that for 5 nights please.
How many guests will be staying at Alexander Bed and Breakfast with you?
The same two that I'm taking to the restaurant, so there are three of us all together.
And what night would you like to start your stay?
The same day as the restaurant reservation which is Saturday.
I'm sorry, they were not able to accommodate those days. Would you like to try booking a different date or for a shorter stay?
Then how about 3 nights?
I've booked accommodations at the Alexander Bed & Breakfast for 3 days beginning Saturday, your reference number is 6KQFIMA2.
Great. That's what I was looking for.  Thanks for your help.
Enjoy your stay and have a nice day.

corpususer.utterance: I need help finding a train that departs from Leicester.
What day and time do you want to depart?
Saturday, but I can't leave until that night after 21:30.

That train is fine can you book it for 8 people?
You are booked for 8 tickets and the total fee is 241.92 GNP at the station. May I help you with anything else today?
Do you have a reference number for that booking?
Yes, sorry about that! Reference number is 77LJ6TH4. Can I assist you with anything else today?
i also need information on an attraction called the fitzwilliam museum.

Can you make a reservation?
I'm sorry. I'm not able to make reservations at a museum.
Can I get the address, and postcode?
Its on trumpington street and the post code is cb21rb. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that is all I need. Thanks for your help.
Thank you for contacting us have a nice day.

Yes, actually, can you provide their postcode as well please?
The postcode for christ's college is cb23bu and the postcode for gonville and caius college is cb21ta. Is there anything else you need?
Yes, I'm also looking for a train to Cambridge from Stansted Airport.
The TR3859 train leaves Stansed Airport for Cambridge on Friday at 05:24, would you like to make a booking?
Not just yet. I actually need to find one that doesn't leave the airport until sometime after 20:00 on Saturday. I'll need the price and arrival time info on that please.
Thank you, we have train TR0446 leaving at 20:24 and arriving at 20:52, for 8.08 pounds. Would this time work for you?
OK, thanks, I'll take care of it from there.
Thank you for contacting Cambridge TownInfo centre.  I hope you have a pleasant trip!  Goodbye!

Yes, I need to create a booking for 5 people. We will be staying for 5 nights starting from Thursday.

Can you try for 4 nights?

I can book you with scudamores punting co located in the centre area. The entrance fee is ? and the address is granta place, mill lane. Is that fine?
That should be great! what about the entrance fee?

No.  That covers it.  Thanks.

Just to confirm, there are no expensive restaurant 's serving polynesian food on the east side, is that right?

What about an expensive British place in the east?
sure, there is the grafton hotel restaurant in that area.
Great! May I get the phone number and address?
They are at Grafton Hotel 619 Newmarket Road Fen Ditton, postcode cb58pa, they can be reached at 01223241387, can I help with anything else?

corpususer.utterance: I'm looking for information on the museum of archaelogy and anthropology.

What is the phone number?
01223333516 is the phone number, is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Yes. I would like to book a train from Leicester.
OK, what is your travel day, and what time do you need to travel?
I'm leaving from Leicester on Wednesday and going to Cambridge.  Want to leave after 11

That'll be all! Thank you very much.

corpususer.utterance: I want to find a four star hotel that has free internet.
There are 3 hotels matching your criteria. Would you prefer an expensive or cheap price range?
I would like a cheap hotel.
The Cambridge Belfry is a match to your request.  Would you like to book a room there?
Yes, please book it for 6 people for 4 nights starting saturday.  I'll need the reference number when it is booked.  Thank you.
Your booking was successful. The reference number is W30R422G.
thank you. I also need to book a train out of cambridge after 20:30.
What day will you be traveling? And will it be for 6 people, also?
I'm not sure yet how many people but I would like to leave on Wednesday.
What station will you be traveling to?
I will be going to Ely.
I have train TR8533 leaving at 21:50 and arriving at 22:07. Would you like to book seats on that?
how much would one ticket cost?
The price for that train is 4.40 pounds.  Would you like to book a ticket?
Not at this time but thank you.
Alright. Thank you for calling.

corpususer.utterance: I am looking for some information.  I need to find a cheap place to stay.
We have ten places in the area with cheap pricing options, any other things to search for to narrow it down?
a star rating of 0
At 0 stars your choices are El Shaddai, or City Centre North B&B.
Well can you recommend the a hotel from these choices and then book me 2 nights for 4 people starting from Friday. I will need my booking reference number.

Now I need to find a place to go visit, should be in the east part of the town

What is their entrance fee?

I need a taxi between the hotel and the Camboats. I want to leave the Camboats by 3:45.
Ok. I booked a black toyota for you.  Your contact number is 07070847179.
Okay that will be all then. Thank you for your help.
Enjoy your taxi and day.
Thank you very much, I appreciate all the services you offer.
You're welcome, have a great day!

corpususer.utterance: I need a taxi to meet me at my restaurant.
What location and time would you like to get the taxi for?
im in Cambridge central and would like to be picked at 1200hrs
I need more information about your location.  What is your exact departure site and what is your destination?
Actually never mind.  I would just like to find a college to visit in town.
We have many colleges, is there are particular part of town you are interested in?
No, no particular part of town. I will take a recommendation from you. I will need the postcode, area, and entrance fee please.
Okay Christ's College is free and is in the centre. The address is Saint Andrew's Street and post code is cb23bu.
Okay, thank you. I'm also looking for a place to stay. It needs to be in the centre, moderately priced, and include wifi.
cityroomz would suit your needs. Would you like me to book it for you?
Yes I'd like it for 4 people and 4 nights starting Saturday.
Okay, you've got it. I booked successfully for you, and the ref. number is 103OAAXG
That's great, thanks, have a good day.
Can I look up anything else for you?
yes I would need a taxi
Do you want the taxi taking you from the hotel or to the hotel? What time do you wish to arrive or depart?
I need to leave the hotel by 10:00.
Where are you looking to travel?
Going from attraction to hotel.
Booking completed! Booked car type white bmw. Contact number is 07232889421. is there something else i could help you with?
That's all for now. Thank you for all your help and have a great day.
You're welcome, let me know if I can assist with anything else.

corpususer.utterance: I'm looking for Crossover food in the centre.
I'm sorry but there are no restaurants in that area that serve Crossover food. Can I help you find one in a different area?
A moderate priced crossover located in the centre, nothing?
No, I am so sorry but there are no restaurants that match that description.
How about modern european food?
De luca cucina and bar is available would you like to try that?
Sounds wonderful! May I have their postcode, address and phone number please?
Yes, their postcode is cb21aw, address is 83 Regent Street, and phone number is 01223356666. Can I help you with anything else?
Yes, actually, I need to find a train schedule. I'll be traveling from Cambridge to London Liverpool Street.
There are many trains making that trip, do you have a day and time you would like to travel?
Yes, I'm traveling on Saturday, and I will need to arrive by 14:30.
I do have train TR3312 that departs at 11:59 and arrives by 13:27. Would that be something that would work for you?
Yes, that would work quote well. I won't be needing a ticket just yet, though. Thank you!
Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's all I need. Thank you for all your help - goodbye!
Okay great. Glad I could help.

corpususer.utterance: I am looking for a place to stay with a 4 star rating and free wifi.
There are 21 places that meet your criteria. Is there a specific area and price range you are looking for?
Do you have any in the south?
Yes. Rosa's bed and breakfast has a cheap price range. Aylesbray lodge guest house has a moderate price range. Would you like me to book one for you?
I meant to say west, not south. And the place needs to be a hotel type.
The huntingdon marriott hotel	is in the west area, it has free wifi, and it is in the expensive price range. Shall I book reservations?
No at this time. What is the postcode for the hotel and do they have free parking?
They do have free parking, the postcode is pe296fl
Thank you. I also need to find a train for Tuesday.
Ok... I need more information for your train, such as departure or arrival times, number of people, day, and destination.
I would like to go to Peterborough on Tuesday and I will need to leave after 20:00.  Can you tell me when I will arrive and the price?
Okay, there is a train leaving cambridge for peterborough tuesday at 20:34 arriving at 21:24 for 16.50 pounds.  Would you like me to book this for you?
Yes I would, thank you.
I'd be happy to. How many tickets will you need?
I don't care.
You are booked on train TR5110. Your reference # is AD3EUZB8.  The cost is 16.5 and payable at the station.  Can I help you with anything else?
Nope, that's all I needed. Thank you!
Thank you. Have a good day.

corpususer.utterance: I need to find a train out of Cambridge this Friday.
I can book you one that leaves at 05:00 and you will arrive by 05:51 will that be alright?
No, I need a train that leaves after 17:15 that goes to broxbourne.
There are 5 trains that meet those criteria. One leaves at 18:01. Want to book it?

Thank You. I would also like to know about places to go in the centre area.
There are 44 attractions in the centre.  Would you like the information for the Vue cinema or maybe a museum?
Vue Cinema sounds good. Can I get their address and phone number, and can you tell me how much it is to get in there?
Vue cinema is located at the grafton centre, east road, phone number is 08712240240, and the entrance fee is unknown.
Thank you, have a wonderful day.
Thank you, please let me know if you need anything else.

data.message:
You are looking for information in Cambridge.
You are looking for a restaurant. The restaurant should serve south indian food and should be in the centre.
If there is no such restaurant, how about one that serves italian food.
Once you find the restaurant you want to book a table for 4 people at 18:30 on saturday.
Make sure you get the reference number.
You are also looking for places to go in town. The attraction should be in the type of mutliple sports and should be in the same area as the restaurant.
If there is no such attraction, how about one that is in the type of college.
Make sure you get postcode, entrance fee, and phone number.
You also want to book a taxi to commute between the two places.
You want to make sure it arrives the restaurant by the booked time.
Make sure you get contact number and car type

corpususer.utterance: Please find a place to eat that serves South Indian food in the center.
I'm afraid there are not any. Would you like to try a different part of town or cuisine?
How about Italian food in the centre part of town?  I think that that would work out for me.
There are plenty of locations for Italian! Do you have a specific price range in mind?
No any place will do.
don pasquale pizzeria is an excellent but expensive place in the city centre. would you like more information on it?
That sounds perfect. Could you book a table for 4 people at 18:30 on saturday.
It is booked and the reference number is 6KV9DIDF
I am looking for places to go in town.
Sure! Is there any particular part of the city you want to see, or anything specific you'd like to visit?
I need more info on churches
There are four churches in the centre known for their architecture.  Are you interested in seeing all saint's church?
I'm actually not looking for a church, I need to find a multiple sports attraction near the restaurant.
I'm sorry, but there are no multiple sports attractions in the centre. Would you like me to look for a different kind of attraction near the restaurant?
Sure let's try a college.
There are quite a few.  Were you looking for anything specific pricewise?
Can you give me the name of a popular one?  I'd also like the postcode, entrance fee and phone number.
How about corpus christi college? Its address is saint andrew's street, postcode is cb21rh, and their phone number is 01223338000.
What about the entrance fee? Is there one?
we have four with free entrance
which one do you recommend?
I would recommend Downing College and it is free to enter. Would you like their address?
just postcode and phone please
post code is cb21dq, phone is 01223334860, in case you need the adderss it is on regent street.  Any further questions?
I'll also need to get a taxi to go between the 2 places.
I can help you with that. Which location would you like to have as your pickup point?
I'll need picked up at the College to go to the restaurant.
I have you set for a taxi to get there right in time for your booking, look for a white lexus, they are reachable at 07566657952, any further questions?
Is there a reference number I need?
No, there isn't a reference number just the car type and contact number. Will there be anything else I can assist you with today?
That is all I need today, thanks.
You're welcome. It was a pleasure helping you today. Good-bye.

corpususer.utterance: I need a train going to bishops stortford.
Ok. and where are you departing from?
I'll be departing from Cambridge.
And what day will you be traveling on?
I would like to travel on Sunday.
Is there a certain time you would like to leave after or arrive by?
I can't leave until after 20:30.
TR1389 leaves at 21:29
Can you arrange travel for 7 people for TR1389 on Sunday?
Of course. The reference number is NI1LNIIP. The total fee is 56.56 which can be paid at the station.
Great, thank you. I am also looking for a modern European restaurant.
I have 5 options for you. Do you have a price range in mind?
Yes. It should be in the moderate price range.
The three choices are Restaurant Alimentum, De Luca Cucina, and Riverside Brasserie. Do you require me to book the table?
The Riverside Brasserie sounds good. Can you tell me the area they are located in?
Riverside Brasserie is located in the centre. Can I help you with anything else today?
I don't know that area very well, can you give me the exact address? I'll use gps to get there. Thanks!
Doubletree by Hilton Cambridge Granta Place Mill Lane is the address

Restaurant-Inform: Doubletree by Hilton Cambridge Granta Place Mill Lane

corpususer.utterance: What area is that in?
It is located in the centre, would you like a reservation?
No thank you, I will just need the area and address, can you confirm both of those please?
Sure. The Riverside Brasserie is located in the center area of town and the address is Doubletree by Hilton Cambridge Granta Place Mill Lane. Anything else today?

Restaurant-Inform: Doubletree by Hilton Cambridge Granta Place Mill Lane

corpususer.utterance: That's it, thank you very much for your help.
It seems there was a glitch in our system. Let me just confirm with you...is there anything else I can help you with today?
That's okay. I know how that is sometimes. That was it. Thanks for your help and have a great day.
Thank you for contacting us today. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Good-bye.

corpususer.utterance: I need somewhere to stay.
Did you have a price range in mind, or a general location?  Is it a hotel you're looking to stay in?
Yes, a hotel. Something 2 stars.
Ok, I found 3 for you. Did you want to book one?
Yes, please! Pick your favorite and book it for 7 people, 2 nights. We'll be arriving on Friday.
Booking was successful at the Ashley Hotel. Your reference number is : U595DZ8A.  Can I be of any further assistance today?
Yes, where would you suggest to eat?

I would like italian please.
Are you sure that you are looking for a place to eat?
Actually can you find an attraction called Jesus College.

I need a taxi to return back to the hotel. I'll be leaving the college at 3:15 PM.
I was able to get you the cab it will be a white ford and the contact number is 07388656472. Is there anything else I can help you with?
That is all. Thanks so much!
You are welcome. Feel free to contact Cambridge TownInfo centre, again. Goodbye.

corpususer.utterance: I'm looking for a restaurant in the centre serving Welsh food.
Unfortunately, I don't see any restaurants that meet your needs. Would you like to broaden your search area?
Sure, I guess so.
I'm sorry I am still not finding anything. is there another type of food you would be interested in looking for?
Well, can I get some african food instead?
The Bedouin fits that description. Would you like any more information about the restaurant or assistance booking a visit?
Is it in he expensive range? If it is I would like to book a table for 7 at 1:00 on Sunday.
It is expensive, yes. May I ask you to repeat the exact time you would like to book a table for?
Yes, I want to book a table for 19:00.
I was unable to complete your booking. Would you like to try and book for another day or for another time slot?
Yes, can you see if there is a booking available at 18:00 instead? I will also need to make a hotel reservation in a hotel that offers free wifi.
There are nine hotels with wifi offered. What price range are you looking for? In the meantime, I will also attempt your restaurant booking.
I would like the hotel also to be expensive with at least a 4 star rating.  I will need a reference number for my reservation.
Your table is booked at the Bedouin for 18:00 on Sunday. Reference number WG0TBBPF. I see that the University arms hotel is in the same area.
Can I have the University arms hotel's phone number and address?
The address for the University Arms Hotel is Regent Street and the phone number is 01223351241. Would you like me to make a reservation for you?
Can you confirm the area of that hotel?  I also need a taxi to go from the hotel to Bedouin, I will need to arrive by 18:00.
The University Arms is located in the Centre. I have also booked you a taxi. Look for a Red Volvo. The taxi's contact number is 07835109126. Will you need anything else?
Nope that should be it thanks
Great, I hope I was able to assist you with everything you needed. Have a good day.
Thank you for your help.
You are very welcome. Enjoy your stay!

corpususer.utterance: I'm looking to play a variety of sports. Are there facilities that cater to that?
Yes, there is one such facility, The Cherry Hinton Village Centre, located at colville road, cherry hinton in the east side of town.
Do you have anything like that in the centre?
Unfortunately, we do not.
What about a museum in the center?
I have listings for 5, can i recommend one?
Yes please, and I'm going to need the address.
You may want to try castle galleries.
What is their address?
The Castle Galleries is located at Unit SU43, Grande Arcade, Saint Andrews Street.  It's in the City Centre.
Okay, that sounds great. I also need a train that leaves on Sunday after 17:30 from Cambridge going to Stevenage.

Reference number is : MVFN99UC.
Thanks a bunch! I couldn't have done it without you. Bye.
You are welcome. Thank you for contacting the Cambridge TownInfo centre. Goodbye.

corpususer.utterance: I'm looking for a cheap restaurant that serves modern european food.
the river bar steakhouse and grill meets your preferences. They are located in centre at Quayside Off Bridge Street.

Restaurant-Inform: the river bar steakhouse and grill

corpususer.utterance: Thank you very much.
You're welcome, goodbye.
Wait, I need a reservation, please. Can I get a table on Wednesday at 18:45 for 2 people? I'll need the reference number.
Your reservation is all set, reference number is U4UFT1IY
I need a cheap place to stay, too. Can you find me something in the centre?
The Alexander Bed and Breakfast guesthouse is 4 stars and the El Shaddai is 0 stars.  Would you like me to book one of these options for you?

Hotel-Inform: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast guesthouse

corpususer.utterance: The Alexander Bed and Breakfast guesthouse will be fine, thanks.
Thank you. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
I need more information about the guesthouse, do they have free parking?  What is the address and phone number?
Parking is free, the phone number is 01223525725 and the address is 56 saint barnabas road.
Could you book a taxi for me? I am looking for one to take me between the restaurant and hotel and i need it to arrive at the restaurant by the booked time.
I have booked the taxi, the contact number is 07846881745. The car type is a grey ford. Anything else I can help you with today?
No that's all I needed. Thank you!
You're Welcome. Thank you for using our services.

moderate please.

corpususer.utterance: I would like to make a reservation at the Maharajah Tandoori restaurant for my trip to Cambridge.
For when and how many?
Can you book a table for 5 people at 16:00 on monday?

Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is : ZB0MA4IZ. May I help you further?
Yes, I also need a train for the same day. We are coming from Stevenage.
Train TR9013 will get you from Stevenage to Cambridge at 14:43. It departs at 13.54. Would you like to book a ticket?
I'd prefer something earlier, actually. I need to be in Cambridge by 12:30.
I have a train arriving at 10:43. How does that sound?
That sounds great.  What time does it leave and how much will it cost me?
It leaves at 9:54 and it will cost 12.80.
Please book it and send me the reference number.
Your train tickets are booked for TR 8265, departing from Stevenage at 9:54, arriving in Cambridge at 10:43. Your reference number isD0V6U0MA. Total is 64 GBP payable at the station.
Fantastic, thank you for the information.
Is there anything else that I can do for you?
I think that is all I needed today. Thank you.
You're welcome. Have a great day.

corpususer.utterance: I am looking for places to go in town. Maybe a museum. I would prefer it to be in the centre of cambridge.
There are 11 museums located in the centre of Cambridge. Did you have one in particular in mind or a type you would be interested in visiting?
Whatever you recommend. I do need an address, though.
I recommend the castle galleries, it is located at unit su43, grande arcade, saint andrews street. Would you also like the phone number?
Yes please!!  I would also like to book a train arriving in Cambridge before 13:00.
Castle Galleries can be reached at 01223307402. Where are you departing from and which day are you traveling?
I am traveling on Saturday and I am departing from stansted airport
I have found 8 trains meeting your criteria. The first leaves at 0524. Would you like me to book it for you?
Yes, please! Can I also get the train ID and the price on that?
TR4194 will cost 8.08 pounds. How many tickets do you need?
I need one ticket.
Okay, Booking was successful, the total fee is 8.08 GBP payable at the station. Your reference number is : KLU8N9Y4. Is there anything else I can help with?
No, that's it! Thank you for your help
It's not a problem! Thanks for using the Cambridge TownInfo centre!

corpususer.utterance: I'd like a train from Birmingham New Street that will arrive by 12:45, please.
What is your destination and what day would you like to leave?
I am coming to cambidge on friday.
Great.  There are four trains available with departure times every hour starting at 05:40 until 09:40.  Would you like to book a ticket on one of them?
Yes please, I need 6 tickets and a reference number for my purchase when you are done.  Thanks!

You are successfully booked for 4 ticket with a total fee of 450.6 GBP that is payable at the station and the reference number is : 5JAC9295. May i help you with something else? If not have an awesome day.
I am also looking for a hotel. I think it is called Kirkwood House.
Yes I've found the kirkwood house at 172 chesterton road. Would you like me to make a reservation?
Yes please. Can you please make the it for six people and for three nights starting on the same day as the train.
I'm sorry, there is no availability for that time frame. Would you like to travel a different amount of days?
Can you check for 2 nights instead? And I need the reference number.

Booking was successful.
Reference number is : DOSXP70O. Is there anything else you need to know?
No, thank you. Have a great day!
You too, enjoy your stay in Cambridge.

corpususer.utterance: Hello, I'm looking for a place to stay that offers free parking.
What area would you like the hotel in?
I would like it to be in South please.
Is there a price you are looking for?
I am looking for an expensive place to stay.
Would you like a hotel or guesthouse?
I would like a hotel please.
I have one hotel that would suit your needs. It's called the Lensfield Hotel. They offer free parking and free wifi. Can I book you a room?
How many people?
How many people will be staying with you?
I need it booked for 3 people for 5 nights starting from friday.
Booked! Reference number: 68SV7AUH.
Thank you, I also need to find a place to eat serving mexican food in the same area as the hotel
There's the chiquito restaurant bar but its rather expensive. If that's okay, I can help you make a reservation.
Can I have the phone number and post code for that please?
Their phone number is 01223400170 and their postcode is cb17dy
I need a taxi from the hotel to the restaurant, leaving the hotel by 02:30, I have to make sure Im first in line when they open for breakfast.
Out taxis operate 24/7, so you are in luck.  Look for a white skoda, there phone number is 07842340394, any further questions?
No thats all I need for today.
Okay. You have a great day.

corpususer.utterance: Can you find me a guesthouse with free parking?
I certainly can look for that for you. It looks like I have several. Do you prefer a certain price range?
No, but I'm looking for something with at least two stars.

Do you have a hotel that is four stars then?
We have several!  Do you wish to stay in a certain part of town?
The location doesn't matter, but I would prefer a guesthouse if possible.
I would recommend the Acorn Guest House then. It has 4 stars, free wifi, free parking and is moderately priced. Would you like to book a room?
Yes please. There are 8 of us and we'll be arriving on Saturday.
Can you please give me how many days you will be staying?
I'll be staying for 5 nights.
I have you book for that time, the reference code is UA3N0Q3R.
I'm happy and relieved. That's everything. Thank you so much for your help.
I am glad, have a great day. Good Bye.

corpususer.utterance: I am looking for a 4 star hotel in Cambridge with free wifi.
I have several options for four star hotels with free wifi. What area would you like to stay in?
I would like to stay in the centre please.
I have two hotels that meet your requirements. the Alexander Bed and Breakfast, and the University Arms Hotel. Would you like me to book a reservation for either one?
I'd like their phone numbers and what type hotel they are please
Sure, the Alexander Bed and Breakfast is a guesthouse, phone number 01223525724, and the University Arms Hotel is a hotel, phone number 01223351241.
On second thought could you book Alexander B&B for Saturday night please.
Certainly. For how many nights? And will it just be you staying?
I'm not sure but I do need to book a train from Kings Lynn to Cambridge after 16:30 on a Monday.
The first available train from Kings Lynn to Cambridge that leaves after 16:30 on Monday is the TR0415; would you like to go ahead and book this?
Yes please.  I will need tickets for 2 people.
19.6 GBP is payable at the station. Your reference number is DZJVJJH6.
Thank you very much! That was everything that I needed. Take care and have a great day.
You're welcome. Enjoy your stay
Thanks for your help!
thank you.
I apologize, it looks like I forgot to book the hotel. Alexander B&B, Saturday night thru Monday, for two adults, please.
I booked you a reservation at Alexander B&B, Saturday night thru Monday, for two adults.  Is there anything I can assist with?
No, that's all. Thank you.
Have a great day!

You are traveling to Cambridge and excited about seeing local tourist attractions.
You are looking for places to go in town. The attraction should be in the type of college.
Make sure you get phone number.
You are also looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the type of guesthouse and should be in the west.
The hotel doesn't need to include internet.
If there is no such hotel, how about one that has free wifi.

corpususer.utterance: I'd like to find a college to visit.
There are 18 colleges to choose from. Are you looking to visit a specific area?
Yes somewhere in Cambridge.
There are 13 in the centre of the town, many of them offer free entrance. Would you be interested in Christ's college?
Yes, could I get their phone number please? I also need a guesthouse in the West as well.
You can reach Christ's College at 01223334900. As far as guesthouses, I have 2 that meet your criteria. Both offer free wifi and parking. Hobson's House is moderately priced.
Hobson's House sounds interesting. What is their phone number?
You can reach Hobsons House at 01223304906. Is there anything else I can help you with?
That sounds good, thank you.
Would you like me to book a room for you at Hobson's House?
No, thank you. I just only need the information of the guesthouse.
Hobsons House is in the west, on 96 barton road, cb39lh. It's in the moderate price range. It's a 3 star hotel with free wifi and parking. Anything else?
That will be all. Thank you!
Please contact us again if there is anything else you should need.
That seems to be all I need. Thank You.
You are very welcome. Good bye.

corpususer.utterance: I need to take a train departing from stansted airport?
I can help you with that. Where would you be going and what day?
I'd like to leave cambridge after 14:00 on Sunday.
Can you verify whether you are leaving from stansted airport or cambridge?
I need to leave from stansted airport to cambridge.
The TR4227 train leaves at 14:24 would you like that one?
Yes, may I get travel time in minutes? I am also looking for a restaurant that is expensive and serve afghan food.
The duration of that train is 28 minutes. There aren't any restaurants meeting those specifications.
There isn't any afghan places in the centre?
I'm afraid we don't have any restaurants in Cambridge that serve Afghan food. There are several expensive restaurants in the centre that serve other cuisines. Should we try one of those?
Are there any that serve Indian food, instead?
There are 6 restaurants in the centre that are expensive and serve indian food.  Curry Garden, The Golden Curry, Saffron Brasserie, Panahar, Curry King, and Curry Queen.
How about Curry Queen? I just need their postcode.
curry king's post code is cb21ug.  their address is  jordans yard bridge street city centre.  shall i book a table for you?

You are planning your trip in Cambridge.
You are looking for a train. The train should leave on monday and should depart from cambridge.
The train should leave after 13:00 and should go to kings lynn.
Make sure you get price, arrival time, and travel time.
You are also looking for places to go in town. The attraction should be in the type of entertainment.
Make sure you get area, address, and postcode

corpususer.utterance: What trains are available from Cambridge on Monday
The first train departs at 05:00 and every 2 hours. The last one leaves at 13:00. Can I book you some tickets?
I wanted to leave after 13:00. When is the last train to kings lynn?
There is one leaving at 13:11, and they run every hour after that. That last one on Monday leaves at 23:11 and arrives at 23:58.
Great. How much is the ticket for the train leaving at 13:11? What time does it arrive and what is the travel time?
Sure, TR0793 leaves at 13:11, arrives at 13:58 and costs 9.80 pounds travel time 47 minutes.
Sounds good. Get me a ticket for TR0793. Thank you in advance.
The booking was successful, you will pay 9.8 GBP at the station.  Your reference number is HIF2WMPY.  Is there anything else I can help you with?
I also would like to find an entertainment area in town. Any suggestions?
You could try out Funky Fun House on the East side. Does that sound good or would you like to hear other options?
Yeah that'd be good can you please give me the address and postcode as well?
Funky Fun House is located at 8 mercers row, mercers row industrial estate, cb58hy. Can I help you with anything else today?
Great that's all the info I need!
Bon voyage!

corpususer.utterance: I'd like to find a 4 star hotel with free wifi, please.
Sure, what part of town would you like to stay in?
I want something in the east part of town.
Did you have a price range in mind?
I am flexible about cost, I would prefer free wifi and a 4 star rating though.
Unfortunately there aren't any hotels that match that description, would be willing to change your specifications?
I'm looking for a hotel that has wifi and a rating of 4 stars in the east part of the city.
There are no hotels that meet that critera, would you be interested in a guesthouse perhaps? We have several of those that fit that critera.
Sure, what do you have available for a guesthouse with that criteria?
There are 6 guesthouses in the east that have 4 stars and free wifi.  3 are moderate in price and 3 are cheap.  All but 1 have free parking.
Please book one for me in the moderate price range.
Sure, I just need some more information.  When will you be arriving and for how long?
I will be arriving on Friday for 4 nights.  There will be 6 of us.
I booked it for a and b guest house. Your reference number is 8K0I474M. Is there anything else I could help you with today?
Yes, I need a train on Tuesday to Leicester.
Where do you want to leave from? Also do you have a preference for an arrival or departure time?
It should depart from Cambridge and arrive by 21:00.
There is a train that arrives at leichester by 20:06.  It is TR0776, shall I book this for you?
Yes, please I need tickets for all 6 of us and I need a reference number
Booking was successful, the reference number is 7BB9B19A., the total cost will be 37.80 payable at the station, can I help with anything else.
I got the reference number of 7BB9B19A thank you!
Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, that was all.  Thank you.
Thank you for using our service. Have a good day. Goodbye.

corpususer.utterance: Could you help me find a moderately priced place to stay?
Is there a particular area of town you would like to stay in?
No. However I would like for the hotel to be 4 star and include free wifi.
I only have guesthouses matching that criteria. Would you like me to book one for you?
Could you check one more time.  Moderate, free parking, free wifi, and 4 stars.
I am only finding guesthouses. There are no hotels in that range. Can I assist you with something else?
Well, I really need a hotel, I will have 7 people including myself. The location doesn't matter.
I'm sorry, but I can't conjure up hotels that don't exist. Would you like to stay in a guesthouse instead?
Yes, that would be fine as long as it meets the criteria. It needs to be for 7 people, 5 nights, and start on Monday.
OKay, shall I book this for you?
Yes I would like to make these reservations.
Done! Your reference number is YGWRZX9D. Can I help you with anything else?
I'd also like to book a train departing from Cambridge on Saturday.
Where would you like to travel to?
i am going to peterborough and need to arrive by 18:15.
TR5194 would suit your needs. Can I book it for you?
book for 7 people and give me the reference number
Your total is 92.4 GBP, which you can pay at the station. Your Reference number is : S55ESSEW.
Thank you, that's all I need for today.
You are very welcome. I was happy to assist you. Good-bye.

corpususer.utterance: We want to try a restaurant in the centre of Cambridge.
What type of food do you prefer?
I am really in the mood for some Hungarian food, something expensive since it is a special occasion.
I'm not finding Hungarian restaurants in the centre of Cambridge. Would you like to try another area or another type of cuisine?
how about one that serves french food
No French restaurants either. Perhaps in a different area?
Let's keep looking in the centre area for now. Perhaps you can list some other available cuisines.
Actually, there is a French restaurant in the centre part of town. The Cote restaurant serves French food and is the expensive price range. Would you like to book a table?
No but I would like the phone number.
Sure, their phone number is 01223311053. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Thanks, and yes, I am also looking for a train leaving Stansted airport and arriving in Cambridge by 9:15.
On what day and time could you like to travel?
I need to leave on Monday.
The TR7360 train arrives at Cambridge at 8:52 on Monday. Would you like to purchase tickets on this train?
Can you book that for two people and then give me the reference number?
All set. Your reference is TVLEP11V and 20.2 GBP is payable at the station. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
That will be all. Thanks so much for your help.
you are welcome any time you need our help
Okay sounds great. Bye!
Have a great day! Good-bye.

corpususer.utterance: I am looking for a hotel in Cambridge that has free parking and is in the expensive price range.
I found five expensive hotels with free parking.  What part of town are you wanting to stay in?
Are any of them guest Houses?
I would like a guesthouse with free parking.  Do any of those 5 fit that?
I am looking for a guesthouse in the expensive price range with free parking.
I'm sorry, there are no expensive guesthouses with free parking.  Would you like to change one of your parameters and search for a moderate guesthouse?
How about a moderate price range?
I have the Archway house, it is a guesthouse in the moderate price range and has free parking.
What is the full phone number and area code of the Archway house?  Also, is there a persian restaurant near the centre of the location?
The phone number is 01223575314. What price range would you like the persian restaurant to be?
Also expensive. May I have the post code and area of the Archway house as well?
The Archway house is in the north area and the postcode is  cb43pe.
Thank you. Did you locate a persian restaurant?
There are no persian restaurants. Would you like to try something else?
Somewhere that serves international food please.
Sure I have three restaurants to choose from. Do you have a price range preference?
Yes, it should also be moderate priced.
I have found 2 restaurants, The Varsity or Bloomsbury. Which one would you prefer.
Which one has tables available for 3 people at 15:00 on Friday?
The varsity restaurant does, reference number is SPYMN3FB
Thank you for all of your help!
You are quite welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No.  You have been quite helpful.  Thank you so much!
You are welcome! Goodbye!

corpususer.utterance: Hi, I am coming to Cambridge soon and am excited to eat at some great restaurants.  Can you recommend an attraction for me to visit while I'm there?
What type of attraction were you interested in?
I don't have a preference, but I'd like it to be in the centre.
Well, we've got the all saints church in the centre and it's free to visit.
A free church would cover a lot of my local historical interests. What is their phone number?
The phone number is 01223452587. The address is jesus lane with the post code of cb58bs. Do you need any other information?
I'm also looking for an expensive place to dine that's in the same area as the church.
We have a number of wonderful options for you to dine at in Centre, do you have a particular cuisine in mind or would you like a reccomendation?
I would like some Indian type food.
I have 6 Indian restaurants for you to choose from. May I recommend The Golden Curry?
That would be great. Can you book it for 6 people at 14:15 on Wednesday?
I'm sorry but I wasn't able to make those reservation. Can I try another time?
How about trying at 13:15 instead?
Your table is reserved for 13:15. Your reference number is M5Q28TGA.
I also need a taxi from All Saints Church to the Golden Curry. I need to arrive to the restaurant by 13:15.
I was able to book that taxi. Be looking for a white Ford. If you need to reach them, their phone number is 07045306187. Anything else I can help with?
No, I believe that will be all today. Thank you.
Have a great trip!

You are planning your trip in Cambridge.
You are looking for places to go in town. The attraction should be in the type of college.

You are also looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the moderate price range and should have a star of 2.

corpususer.utterance: Are there any colleges in town?
Why yes. Two in the centre of town and three in the west.
Could you recommend one for me?
I'd recommend Christ's College because it has free entrance. So does Clare Hall, Emmanuel College, Hughes Hall, and Jesus College. Along with a few others.
Okay, great. Can I have the address and phone number for Christ's College?
Their address is saint andrew's street and their phone number is 01223334900. Can I help you with anything else today?
I would like some help finding a room in the city. I really want it to be a hotel as opposed to a guesthouse.
Sure I can help you with that. Do you have a price range and do you know what area you want to stay in?
yes, I am looking for a hotel in a moderate price range with 2 stars and I will need to book 5 people for 4 nights. Thank you.
I have 2 options for you. Both are hotels in the north. They are both 2 stars and offer free parking and wifi. They are the Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge.
Let's make a booking with Ashley Hotel. I'll need the rooms starting on Saturday and I'll need the reference number as well.
You are all set! Your reference number for your booking is EDL2AH3X. Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, that will be all. Thank you for your help!
Thank you for using our system today!

You are looking for information in Cambridge.

The train should arrive by 08:45 and should leave on thursday.
Once you find the train you want to make a booking for 8 people.

corpususer.utterance: I need to book a train to cambridge from a train leaving from stevenage.
Hello, there are many options available, do you know what day or time you would like to arrive?
I would like to arrive at 8:45 on thursday
There are two trains that leave Stevenage and arrive in Cambrige at 6:43, one leaves at 5:54 and the other 7:54, would you like to book one of those?
Can you please book me for the train that arrives latest. I need 8 tickets.
I have booked 8 tickets for you on the train leaving at 7:54 and arriving at 8:43. Your reference number is NFDWJXJO.
Thank you, I'm also looking for a north indian restaurant in the centre area.
Unfortunately there are no North Indian restaurants in the centre of Cambridge. Is there a different area or type of cuisine that would suit you as well?
How about asian oriental food?
There are several options available in center Cambridge. I would be happy to assist with your reservation. What price range restaurant are you interested in?
I don't have a specific price range. Just something in the centre will be fine.
There are 4 options - dojo noodle bar, yippee noodle bar, j restaurant, and kymmoy. Would you like me to book a table at one of those?
You don't need to book me for any. Could I get the address for the Dojo Noodle Bar, however?
The address is 40210 Millers Yard City Centre. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Nope that should be it thank you
Thank you for using our service. Have a wonderful day.

the lensfield hotel is a nice place
Is the Lensfield a 4 star hotel?
No, it is only three stars. It is the only expensive hotel in that area of town. Would you like to look in a different area?
Ok, how about something with 4 stars that is moderately priced?
The aylesbray lodge guest house is available. Do you need a reservation?
Yes I need it for 2 people checking in on Saturday and staying for 4 nights.

That is all I need today thank you.
Well thank you and enjoy your stay
